snippet: Rob Ford, the mayor of Toronto, told reporters on Friday that he had been subpoenaed to testify at a court hearing related to efforts by his unofficial driver to recover a video showing the mayor smoking crack cocaine.
abstract: Toronto Mayor Rob Ford tells reporters that he has been subpoenaed to testify at court hearing related to efforts by his unofficial driver Alexander Lisi to recover video showing Ford smoking crack cocaine.
lead_paragraph: Rob Ford, the mayor of Toronto, told reporters on Friday that he had been subpoenaed to testify at a court hearing related to efforts by his unofficial driver to recover a video showing the mayor smoking crack cocaine.

headline.main: Toronto Mayor Called to Testify in Canada
headline.print_headline: Canada: Toronto Mayor Called to Testify
